title: What was Elton John like as a musician in the studio? - Quora

response.answer_text: Fast! He had a crack band, and he could start from lyrics, compose the music in an hour or two, and get a whole song with a complex arrangement recorded within a few hours in the studio. An extremely high standard of musicianship and creativity, and when he was working, he worked hard. He also partied hard, to a legendary degree. We’re lucky he got through that.
